body_html: @carpodaster sara removed me as an organizer and i did have a different view on the teams. i couldn't e.g. add a supervisor to the team anymore. but i could still see the supervisor - empty field once it was created.
body_text: @carpodaster sara removed me as an organizer and i did have a different view on the teams. i couldn't e.g. add a supervisor to the team anymore. but i could still see the supervisor - empty field once it was created.
body: @carpodaster sara removed me as an organizer and i did have a different view on the teams. i couldn't e.g. add a supervisor to the team anymore. but i could still see the supervisor - empty field once it was created.
